welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bretigny-sur-Orge, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and most iconic terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, known for its unique circular design.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
